constantValues: A specific item in a queue, such as a case record or an activity record.

definitions.description: A specific item in a queue, such as a case record or an activity record.

members.name: queueItemId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the queue item.

members.description: Unique identifier of the queue item.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Queue' adds the 'queueId' attribute below to the 'QueueItem' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Choose the queue that the item is assigned to.
